title: Bihar: School & colleges to remain closed till April 18 amid rising Covid cases
description:
Amid the continued surge in Covid-19 cases, the Bihar government has ordered the closure of all government and private schools, colleg in the city. The announcement in this regard was made by Delhi Chief Minister Arvind Kejriwal on Friday.

The other states have also taken this decision. 

Delhi Health Minister Satyendar Jain on Thursday stated that the current wave of coronavirus spreading among the people aged between 20 to 45 years has raised concerns. He said that youth may not get affected much but it can pose a threat to the elderly at home. Therefore, vaccination should now be made available to all ages.
